name: QPlay Tech
tagline: QPlay Tech - Passion for Agile Delivery
description:
At QPlay, we love converting ideas into stunning designs and products!
 
QPlay is award winning full stack technology development team with strong focus on mobile and web technologies. Our strong understanding of Agile based development will ensure you to beat your time-to-market expectations. We closely work our clients from market study to development and deployment of App. More than a dozen of clients ranging from startups from Silicon Valley to Public listed companies have benefitted from our understanding of technology and updates in the field.
"We will take care for you what we are best at; so that you can take care of what you are best at."
